extraInfo.title: Usage
extraInfo.content: Apply to wet skin, massage gently to create a rich lather, then rinse thoroughly. For best results, use daily.

extraInfo.title: Shipping & Delivery
extraInfo.content: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping available at checkout. Free shipping on orders over 500 MAD.
